page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My family has three people in it,my mum, my dad and me.My mum is called Dorothy, my dad is called Steven and I'm called Fraser. We have moved twice. First from Somerset to Preston, then from Preston to Hayfield. My mum was born in Glasgow, my dad was born in Sussex and I was born in Somerset.We moved because my dad had been promoted.Most Saturdays we go to New Mills or Manchester.Most Sundays we go to the Lantern Pike for a drink,followed by a drive around the country.Most holidays we go to Scotland or Cornwall,but I've never been to a foreign country.We have a dog called Toby.Our family car is a Maestro.My dads hobby is collecting dinky cars but he has got more army vehicles. My mums hobby is woodwork. My hobby is collecting matchbox cars I've got two carrier cases full.
